title: Video Of A Tractor Machine Pulling A Hay Baler - Free Stock Creative Commons Video

tasks.task: Driving a agricultural equipment to prepare a field for planting
subtasks: Sitting in the tractor seat
Operating the steering wheel to navigate the field
Engaging the tillage implement to turn over soil
Monitoring the depth and coverage of tillage
Adjusting the implement's settings as needed

tasks.task: Unloading planting equipment
subtasks: Unhooking the planter from the tractor
Guiding the planter onto the field

tasks.task: Planting crops
subtasks: Positioning the planter's row units over the ground
Ensuring proper spacing between plants
Verifying seed depth is correct
Adjusting planting speed and seed drop rate

tasks.task: Loading planting equipment onto a truck
subtasks: Detaching the planter from the tractor
Hitching the planter to a trailer or truck
Securing the equipment for transport

tasks.task: Assisting with crop harvest
subtasks: Gathering harvested produce from the combine cab
Sorting and grading produce in the field
Loading harvested crops onto a truck or wagon

tasks.task: Maintenance of a combine harvester
subtasks: Checking fuel and oil levels before operation
Ensuring sharpened cutting blades
Tightening loose screws or parts

tasks.task: Driving a combine harvester for harvest
subtasks: Operating the combine to cut and thresh crops
Adjusting the separator settings for optimal grain retention
Monitoring grain loss and header height

tasks.task: Checking the condition of grain bins
subtasks: Inspecting the structure for leaks or damage
Ensuring the bin doors are properly sealed

tasks.task: Subtasks starting with the same MAINTASK must remain together.
subtasks: before each main task and SUBTASK: before subtasks. Also, to make up one task per line, starting with MAINTASK, followed by subtasks below it. So I need to structure it accordingly.
